pageContent:
<path>Build a blocks post</path>
# Build a blocks post
-   Login to Devvit.
-   Start a new project.
```tsx
devvit new <my-project>
```
-   Select the `blocks-post` template. (if you're familar with webviews, you can use `webview-post`)
-   Navigate to your project directory.
```tsx
cd <my-project>
```
-   If you want to add some additional flair to the template code, edit the `src/main.ts` file and save your changes.
    
-   Upload your project.
```tsx
devvit upload
```
-   Use playtest to check out your interactive post on a test subreddit that you moderate.
```tsx
devvit playtest <your-test-subreddit-name>
```
-   Go to your test subreddit to see your interactive post (you might need to hit refresh).
![experience_post](./assets/experience-post-example.png)
When you're done iterating, you can [publish](dev_guide.mdx#9publish) your app and then make it [public](dev_guide.mdx#10gopublic).
